SEARCH
Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.scripts

Class GroovyScriptService

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.scripts.GroovyScriptService
@Service public class GroovyScriptService extends Object
A service for handling Groovy script parsing and execution. This service allows for the loading of Groovy scripts from files and invoking specific methods within the loaded scripts.

This service can be used to extend application logic dynamically by executing Groovy scripts, enabling flexibility and customization for specific behaviors in runtime.

    • parseFile

      public groovy.lang.Script parseFile(File scriptFile) throws IOException
      A method that parses a Groovy script file and returns the Script object.
      Parameters:
      scriptFile - The file containing the Groovy script to be parsed.
      Returns:
      The parsed Script object representing the Groovy script.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • runMethod

      public Object runMethod(groovy.lang.Script script, String methodName, Number... values)
      A method that invokes a given method of methodName in the script object.
      Parameters:
      script - The Script object containing the groovy code.
      methodName - The name of the method to be invoked.
      values - The arguments to be passed to the method.
      Returns:
      The result of the method invocation, or null if an error occurs.
